price: আল্লাহে ক’ব, ‘তোমালোকে পৃথিৱীত কিমান বছৰ অৱস্থান কৰিছিলা’?
arabic: قَٰلَ كَمۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla kam labith'tum fī al-arḍi ʿadada sinīna
